metadata.name: Moon jar_AI_red brown
metadata.description:
The artist tries to demonstrate the principle of AI (artificial intelligence) through the twelve zodiac animals and the moon jar. The animals put the words of moon jar, moon, jar, images of the moon jar and the moon into the speech bubble of a smart rabbit. This speech bubble symbolizes an artificial intelligence engine. This is an input for the moon jars result, after learning about the moon jar, the rabbit starts to make various products of moon jars. If you look at the finished product, you can see the moon, jar, and the moon jar with the drawing of the moon displayed. Among the results, the "moon jar" chosen by the animals is marked "picked."

12간지 동물들과 달항아리를 통해 AI(인공지능)의 원리를 표현하고자 하였습니다. 

**You're purchasing the full non-commercial rights to this creation.
